article.title: AeroVironment Awarded $41.7 Million Contract Option for Raven(R) Small Unmanned Aircraft Systems and Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: AeroVironment Incorporated has received an order from the U.S. Army for RQ-11B Raven(R) small unmanned aircraft systems and associated services. The aggregate order value is $41.7 million.
